name: Land of Strangers
description:
Turnbased Roguelike buckaroo fantasy with mudfaced goons, mercury bubblegum, desert zoos, thorn forests, bricks, and more. Time to saw off the punt gun and sharpen the ol'e kalis, and whoop some rectums in this spiritualized open-world shoot'em'up.

LoSt is a labor of love and a work in progress. The current alpha release is not a finished game, but intended to showcase the engine with a simple assassination mission. Comments are always appreciated.
